categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Jedi Master who lived in the final decades of the Galactic Republic took the Human female Tohno as a Padawan, teaching her studies in architecture and engineering, as well as the Jedi ways. The Jedi died during the Clone Wars, and Tohno was left without a Master.
